title: Temporo-spatial analysis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in Spain: Altitude and land use as new determinants of the disease
details: A Santurtún, P Medín, JA Riancho, M Santiago-Setién… - Science of The Total …, 2024
abstract: Introduction Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) is the most common neurodegenerative disease affecting motor neurons. Currently, ALS is conceived as the result of the interaction between genetics, environmental factors, and aging. This …
